```{code-cell}
#include<iostream>
#include "randomization.h

CONST C = RANDOM_INT(-2, 2);
```

+++

```{code-cell}
int I;
// Initialiser la variable I Ã  la valeur C
```

+++

```{code-cell}
---
editable: false
tags: [hide-cell]
---
I = C;
```
+++

```{code-cell}
---
editable: false
tags: [hide-cell]
---
CHECK( I == C );
```
